overview: May-December romances are so taboo, but so irresistible and these lesbian love affairs are no exception. Their only sin is unconventional love. This movie follows the revealing twisted road from desire to pursuit and surrender. Over 3 hours of women passionately seducing each other and reaching intense orgasms the likes of which you've never seen before!
tagline: The revealing twisted road from desire to pursuit and surrender.
title: Lesbian Seductions: Older/Younger 16
